root.name: Frankenstein
root.description: Frankenstein is ransacking the town and took your girlfriend Emily. It is your job to get her back and to stop Frankenstein one and for all. Along the way you fight other famous monsters like Wolfman (known as Man wolf in game) and Dracula. There are only four levels, levels one through three have 2 bosses per level and the last level has three. There are power ups to shoot and weapons but one hit and you lose them.
